code: import React from'react';import{FaGlobe,FaCity}from'react-icons/fa';import'./TopicSidebar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TopicSidebar=_ref=>{let{onTopicSelect,selectedTopic}=_ref;const topics={global:{name:'International News',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaGlobe,{}),subtopics:['Politics','Technology','Economy']},india:{name:'Indian News',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCity,{}),subtopics:['Uttar Pradesh','Lucknow','Local Business']}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"topic-sidebar",children:Object.entries(topics).map(_ref2=>{let[key,topic]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"topic-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`topic-header ${selectedTopic===key?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>onTopicSelect(key),children:[topic.icon,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:topic.name})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"subtopics",children:topic.subtopics.map(subtopic=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"subtopic-btn",onClick:()=>onTopicSelect(`${key}-${subtopic.toLowerCase()}`),children:subtopic},subtopic))})]},key);})});};export default TopicSidebar;
